subject: Basketball
Sneakers
lead_paragraph: Miami held the Lakers to to their lowest point total this season and Kendrick Perkins scored a career-high 25 on 12-for-15 shooting leading Boston to victory on Friday.
snippet: Miami held the Lakers to to their lowest point total this season and Kendrick Perkins scored a career-high 25 on 12-for-15 shooting leading Boston to victory on Friday.
